pullrequest.title: Port SDF Filesystem to Ignition Common

content.raw: The ones I'm most concerned with are `isDirectory()`, `removeDirectory()`, `absPath()`, `cwd()`, and `createDirectories()`.  Of those, the only potential bug I see is in `isDirectory()`; the problem there is "reparse points", which I don't know if windows handles properly (but which FilesystemBoost.cc does handle properly).  For the rest of them, I just think it would be better if we could keep all of the #ifdef-fery to a single file (i.e. FilesystemBoost.cc), rather than having is spread across two.
